name: biomni-query-remap
title: Biomni: Query Remap
description: Query ReMap for transcription factor binding data from ChIP-seq experiments across cell types.
content:
Overview

Searches ReMap, an integrative ChIP-seq database containing TF binding sites, histone modifications, and chromatin accessibility across hundreds of human and model organism datasets.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query
  • endpoint (string, optional): ReMap endpoint
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable logging

Biological Use Case

Critical for gene regulation studies and regulatory network analysis. Researchers use ReMap to map TF binding landscapes, identify co-binding patterns, analyze regulatory elements, compare binding across conditions, and understand transcriptional regulation.

Output

Returns JSON (remap_results.json) with ChIP-seq peak data including coordinates, TFs, cell types, experiment metadata, peak scores, nearby genes, and dataset links.

Category

database
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/database/query_remap.py --prompt "${prompt}" --endpoint "${endpoint}" --verbose "${verbose}" -o "${outputDir}"
